name: ETERNAL LIFE MISSIONARY SOCIETY
briefDescription: AIMS & OBJECTIVES:-	The aims & objectives of the society are as follows: -	a. 	To promote and undertake programme for moral and mental development of youth and women, children and handicapped people in the filed of education, health awareness, sanitation, cultural development and socio-economic development. 	b. 	To establish charitable health centers for the welfare of poor and needy people. For this purpose, Allopathic, Aryurvedic, Unani, Homoeopathic Naturopathy and other sys of medicines will be adopted. 	c. 	To provide information regarding Leprosy, Cancer. T.B. AIDs and other infections diseases in urban and rural areas and to render fee medical facilities and guidance to the general people. 	d. 	To establish, manage and maintain
